11.content:
In the Pokemon of Celadon City, Nurse Joy was working as usual with her Chanseys helping around in the various tasks they do. While the chanseys did their jobs Nurse Joy sat at her desk, waiting for anyone to ask her to heal their pokemon. Though whenever she wasn't working behind the desk, she often enjoyed spending time with Officer Jenny and the gym leader Erika. They often met after work to discuss their jobs and a variety of events going on in Celadon city.

While this Joy did enjoy her job and healing Pokemon, she had a secret wish. Being a sibling in the Joy family made it difficult for her stand out. Even her parents had a hard time telling her apart from her sisters. It was one of the problems of being in a family were everyone looked almost exactly alike. So she always wished that somehow, she could stand out from the rest of her sisters. Though as they say, you should be careful what you wish for, because today her wish would come true when...
11.title: A Normal Nurse Joy...for now!

choices: Munchlax uses something akin Metronome, fattening Joy up greatly somehow
Munchlax starts bringing Joy lots of food
Munchlax brings Nurse Joy some unique and unfamiliar objects
112.content:
There was a strange sound just outside the Pokemon Center as Nurse Joy managed the counter. She wondered what it could be, but it sounded vaguely like a Pokemon's cry as far as she could tell.

"Dia, see if you can't watch the counter for a minute or so." Nurse Joy asked the Chansey by her side as she walked out the door. The Chansey was a bit surprised at first, but didn't object.

Nurse Joy made her way outside. On the streets just outside, she spotted a Munchlax, a Pokemon not commonly seen in Kanto, wandering the streets. It appeared to be a bit battered and also seemed to be a big strange. There was something different about its coat, but it wasn't a Shiny Pokemon. Still, there was no way that Nurse Joy could ignore wounded Pokemon. She ran over, carefully scooping in injured creature in her arms. The Munchlax pitifully tried to wriggle its way out of her arms, but only worked up its injuries, groaning and crying weakly some more.

"It's okay...don't worry, you'll be better soon." Nurse Joy said with a tranquil smile. She slowly walked back in the Center, the little Munchlax not struggling much anymore as it was cradled within Nurse Joy's arms.

"Hold on now...uh, Dia we have a patient STAT." Nurse Joy said calmly. Due to the lack of trainers who needed their Pokemon healed at the current moment, the Chansey, Dia, was able to make its way easily to the Munchlax. It carried the smaller Pokemon in its arms and then started treatment. Joy herself grabbed some Oran Berries she had on hand, which helped ease the Munchlax's pain and help facilitate healing.

"You'll be just fine, don't worry." She said with a smile. Feeling itself heal and seeing Nurse Joy's smiling face, the Muchlax's rebellious attitude nigh on melted away and it started to resist less, accepting the treatment as it laid back. It only look thirty minutes before the Munchlax was able to get up and walk on its own two feet. However, an ache still persisted in the Pokemon's body.

"There you go, good as new!" Nurse Joy said with a smile, patting the small Pokemon on the head, causing it to give Joy a rebellious glare as its face blushed. Still, Munchlax was not careless enough to ignore the human woman had helped it out quite a bit.

"Hmm...maybe you should stay here with me. After all, it would be dangerous to send you back out. We'll wait for a trainer to take you in and you won't have to worry that much about any more attacks."

Munchlax didn't object as Joy smiled at it. The small Pokemon decided it would indeed be a good idea to stay with Joy. However, it processed this act of kindness warranted some repayment of some kind. Question was what...?
112.title: Nurse Joy in action!!

choices: She goes sleep walking and raids the kitchens
She begins to gain weight and Snorlax features
Readers choice
1123.content:
Joy was going about her daily jobs and business at the poke' center, some trainer's had just come in to have their party healed after getting thrashed by the local gym leader, as she finished up the normal procedure for healing and wishing them a nice day and telling them she hoped to see them again soon, she was surprised to feel a tug at the back of her skirt, looking around she saw the injured munchlax from yesterday out of it's bed and trying to get her attention

"well Munchlax what's up with you then? you're certainly looking better though" Joy asked the pokemon, Munchlax didn't respond with an answer instead bounding off back to it's bed, "silly little thing" Joy thought to herself, before stubbing her toe on the strange little rock that Munchlax had left for her as a "Present" (or at least that's what she guessed it must of been)

"ouch, a nice gesture but the little guy's obviously got some shyness to him if he's not wanting to just give it to me himself" Joy thought, a few minutes later she made a point of very loudly saying "What a lovely little gift a lovely little Munchlax left for me, i hope next time he just gives it to me himself instead of leaving it lying around" as she did the rounds of the infirmary and passed the Munchlax's room, the pokemon hearing it's name and the fact Joy had liked the gift

Before long Joy was being tripped up almost constantly by these little rocks that where being left by her feet, she was beginning to get frustrated with the Munchlax not getting the picture about leaving them by her feet where she could trip over them and nearly break her neck as she fell over them time and time again.

"Now look here Munchlax, I like these little gifts your giving me, but can you please not keep putting them where i'll trip over them" Joy found herself almost yelling at the poor thing later that day after she'd recovered from almost falling, a hypodermic needle in her hand at the time almost taking her eye out if it wasn't for Chansey's timely intervention.

Munchlax got the message that time and the only time Joy saw her presents again was when she ended her shift, went up to bed and pulled back the covers to see her nice comfy bed covered in not so comfy rocks, too tired to yell she just pushed them off her bed and slept on the somewhat dirty but just as comfy mattress, as she drifted off to sleep she didn't notice the stones beginning to glow around her as the light enveloped her as she slept
1123.title: Munchlax brings Nurse Joy some unique and unfam...

choices: Just... Try to go through the day as normal. Maybe no one will notice?
Go out and get help, NOW!
11232.content:
Through the night, the stones worked their magic. Nurse Joy's svelt form plumped up as dense poundage piled onto her. She scratched her belly with claws that began to grow from her fingers, as sleek, smooth pink fur began to sprout in places. Soon, she was a good two-hundred pounds from where she was when she'd gotten into her bed, which was now creaking ominously with her weight. Making a noise of contentment, Munchlax hopped onto Nurse Joy's pillowy belly and curled up for a snooze.

*-*-*-*-*

"Mmnph... Snrrrr... Laaaaaax... Mnnh?" Nurse Joy's eyes opened slowly, awakened more by the grumbling of her stomach than the ringing of her alarm clock, which had given up about three hours ago. "Urrph? I must have slept in..." Shuffling off of the bed with a heavy thud, she stretched out and slogged to the bathroom. She was feeling rather sluggish this morning... Taking up a toothbrush, she squeezed out a bead of toothpaste onto it and put it to her fangs...

Wait, fangs?

"...AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!"

The toothbrush went clattering to the sink as Nurse Joy beheld what had happened to her body. She was so fat that her pajamas were tearing at the seams, but that wasn't the strangest thing. No, she'd grown the pointed ears, jutting fangs, sharp claws, and sleek fur of a Snorlax. She looked at her face; her nose had seemingly vanished... She knew that Snorlaxes smelled by tasting the air... What had HAPPENED?
11232.title: The Metasnorphosis

800-1,000 pounds

12.title: "Welcome! BBUUURRRPP!!"

choices: She scarfs down what would fill the of the kids up, jeez she has an appetite!
She asks if they'd like some, and asks them to not make a mess, they get fat
Yuri asks a question, rude but justified nonetheless.
121.content:
"*Gulp...slurp...chomp*" the large nurse of the Pokemon center in Fortree City was spending her down time eating away at one of the tables set up in the lobby. Her rotund belly was pushing against the table and filling out the space underneath a little bit. She had on an extra large nurse's outfit, but her belly was slowly beginning to make its way of showing itself to all. Now despite this Nurse Joy's apparent appetite, she was no slob, a glutton for sure, but not a slob. She was eating from a plate, using Unova style tableware. Holding her utensils in gloves, with several napkins more then necessary coating even her bountiful lap, she was without a doubt....a neat freak. Wiping away some crumbs and carefully making sure to stifle a belch that had risen from her esophagus, she got up from the table and walked back over to the counter to resume her duties to all Pokemon trainers who came to the center.

"Helllo." Joy said as a group of trainers came in, seemingly oblivious to their shocked expressions at her different look then to all the other members in her family. "Uhhh...hi." one of the trainers, a girl with short, straight red hair, wearing a white dress and white beret said as she waved her hand slightly. "Is there anything you need help with?"
"Yeah, we need to get our teams healed, just took on the Fortree Gym Leader." another trainer spoke up, this one a boy with dark blue hair in a trenchcoat and gloves, given his age being somewhere around 14 or so, he looked kind of ridiculous.
"Sure thing, please place your balls here." Joy motioned over to a tray. "Hīringa!" she called out to one of many Chanseys the standard assistant Pokemon all centers were given.
"Chansey!" the egg-shaped pokemon came out from a doorway to the left, and took the tray back, quickly and efficiently. As the trainers waited they decided to go and sit down to eat. Getting out some small boxes of riceballs, bits of grilled steak and grilled Finneon. Getting out their chopsticks, the trainers dug into the meals. Smelling the succulent, aroma of the packed lunches of the kids made Joy drool slightly, wiping her mouth as she smiled, she walked over to "chat". "So what exactly are you three doing here?" She asked politely, eying the food as if they were jewels.
"*gulp* Ohmm We'rme here on a journey throughout Hoen to enter the Hoen League." the other girl answered, this one had long purple hair, tied up in pigtails, and was wearing a small purple shirt, with a light blue jacket covering it. The girl had food on her cheeks, and she had a a little potbelly. Realizing she had bits of food on her face she reached into her pockets to find a napkin, but to no avail. Nurse Joy then kindly took out a napkin from a pocket on her uniform, giving it to the girl to wipe herself off.
"Thanks urrp."
"Geez, Shima! Show some manners will ya?!" the boy barked as he dug into a piece of fish.
"Oh don't be so irritable Yuri, Besides the nurse is probably okay with that. the young dressed girl whispered, giggling slightly to the boy, making note of Joy's physique.
Joy chuckled slightly, making sure the kids didn't hear her, true that while she did enjoy a good belch every now and then, for the most part she tried to keep her appetite in check, refraining from messing up her image as Pokemon Center nurse, officially appointed by the national league to help and support all trainers, though....she admitted she took it a bit far at times.
"I don't mean to try and barge in you three's meal, but...do you mind if I have bite of that grilled Finneon? Its a favorite of mine, and I haven't had it a while." Nurse Joy tried to to put on her kindest, gentlest smile to up her chances of getting food.
"Hrmm...Yuri mused for a second, sure the woman was rather big, and this was something he had been saving since the last town, but...she seemed really nice, and she only did ask for a bite... "Yeah, I guess one bite won't hurt." mentally thinking that something more unlucky would now occur.
Surprising the group, Joy took out a polished fork from her person and took a small piece of the grilled fish, less than what Yuri had expected, given her size. "Guess she's not a huge glutton. Yuri mentally sighed as he was glad his precious Finneon was safe to keep for himself. Joy put her hand to her cheek in bliss, the taste of the warm, chewy fish was exquisite.
"Mmmh! sooo good! While we wait for my Chanseys to come back with healing your Pokemon, do you mind if I join you three?"
"Sure." the girl in the white dress smiled gracefully. Scooching over, as she was the only one on her side of the booth, she let the nurse plant herself down with her friends. Feeling the Nurse's flab push into her smaller body, it made her ever present blissful face become a little embarrassed.
"Oh!" Joy then realized something, getting up she went to the counter to get out her own meal. "If I'm going to eat with you all, I should probably get out my lunch!" she giggled as she walked back, her large gut engulfing the table edge slightly as she placed the lunch on the table. Opening the box up, which was easily 3 times larger then the trianers' boxes combined, she revealed to them...a lot of the stuff they had and much more, except the presentation was vastly superior, giving off the image of being made by a superb chef.
"Woah... Amelia look, she's got Filet Bouffalant! I heard that's available only in Unova!" the purple haired girl, Shima, drooled at the assortment of food, they practically shimmered and glittered off the sunlight and the lighting of the center itself.
"I can't believe she had her own grilled Finneon and it looks better then mine!...at least she only took a bite from mine." Yuri groaned as he looked on that woman's delectable meal.
Taking out her fork and knife, Joy began to dig into her large (for the kids) meal.

Choice 1: Joy easily scarfs down her meal, when it alone would make all three of the kids full.

Choice 2: She asks them if they want some, but tells them to please not make a mess of themselves or the area. They all start to get a bit of a gluttonous trait from this...

Choice 3: Yuri speaks up, wanting to know why the Nurse asked for his fish if she had some herself in the first place.
121.title: The gluttonous Nurse who is actually... neat?!

122.title: 450-600 pounds

choices: She comes to the Center where she sees a trainer in need
She takes a detour to one of the cities resturaunts
More annoying trainers tried to stop her
125.content:
A fairly small Pichu scurries about, happy as one would expect a pokemon as cute as it too. The Pichu's large ears twitched as it heard some very loud thuds slowly approaching.

The chubby little Pichu quickly scurried up an apple tree and stared in awe as a giant human Approached. The ground quaked as the poke'mon approached,apples shaken from the tree. Pichu Held on for dear life as the human came into view. Most humans stood over 6 feet tall and averaged a respectable 200lbs in weight...But this one was far from the normal.

This human looked like one of those healing ladies that helped captured Pokemon get better. The Pichu thinks their called...Nurse Joys. This Nurse Joy stood at a staggering 12 feet in height, and appeared to weigh considerably more than a normal one would at that height. She had long outgrew her nurse clothes, strolling throgh the forest butt naked.

Her massive stomach jiggled with evrey earth-shattering step she took, a ball of pale flesh that jutted out from her by several feet, covering her womenhood. Her belly was perfectly adorned with her two giant breasts resting on top of them, impossible to meassure by bra sizes. If she was just half her height, they would still be the size of Basketballs to her. But as impressivley fat her belly and boobs were, they were nothing to were most of her fat accumuated:

Like two wreaking balls, Nurse Joy's wailord smothering asscheeks bounced and boobed with a mind of their own as she walked leisurley throgh the woods. They wobbled and wiggled themselves into trees, causzing even more destruction. It stuck out so behind her, it formed a balcony of fat, serving as a roof for anything beneath it.

Our chubby little Pichu gasped quietly as he watched the Behemoth of a women approach. his fur standing on end. He'd never seen such a massive human, or Pokemon for that matter! The large Joy munches down various things as he waddled along. trees, Bushes, other Pokemon. The busty beast never did bother to chew, just gulping her feast down whole.

Pichu quietly cried out as the human snatched up the tree Pichu was in. He did his best the escape from the Tree, but wasn't that lucky. The Chubby Pichu was gulped down by the enormous women along with the tree.

The massive Nurse Joy left a trail of barren land behind as it waddled, moaning softly to herself in pleasure as she jiggled. Her massive body quaking with evrey motion from Stepping to eating. The large nurse gorged upon the forest until her fat feet found themselves resting on Pavement. She Snapped out of her almost trance like gorging as her eyes took in the city before her.

Nurse Joy was a failed experiment by team rocket to Genetically alter a human into an unstoppable tank. They integrated her D.N.A with that of a Snorlax's. The result was a nigh unstoppable women with an insatiable appetite. Deemed a failure she was released back into civilization.

You would think that a Nurse Joy who was bigger then a Pokemon Center and was more of a danger to Pokemon than an aide would pursue a different career in life. But not her. She insisted that she was perfectly capable to resume her duties as Nurse Joy and even more so to treat Pokemon. She wasne't, but that still didint stop her. You can't really argue with someone who can destroy your home with one sitting. So the city tolerates Nurse Joy as a sick person would tolerate the flu.

Our monster of a nurse moved her fat body through the city's streets on her way to the drastically undersized Pokecenter, gulping down any foliage she could find from decroative planted trees. A few newcomers to the town gasped and screamned, running as quickly as they could, while the rest countuinued their daily lives. They had all gotten used to Joy's gluttonous behavior and her giant form, and tried not to let it bother them, mearly moving on to the sidewalks where they were relativley safer from her.

A few trainers who had been traveling to the city to battle the local gym leader threw their Pokeballs and commanded their Pokemon to stop the monster. Their efforts were in vain as Joy ignored any attacks she received, hardly feeling even the intense heat from a Charizard's fire breath. The only real results were that she started to sweat from the heat.
125.title: Bigger: Up to a ton!

choices: The Machine Heals them like Normal
Joy suddenly takes the tray by her hands.
Something else happens
1251.content:
The Pokemon Center was alive with trainers and pokemon alike enjoying the it's amenities. Pokemon happily munched down on treats provided at the cafateria while trainer's stocked up on well needed supplies such as potions and ether. It was a place to converse with new people, a chance to make friends and share mew experiences...

...But to the new trainer's that came to the city on their journey, there was one thing that drew in their attention more then anything else. Why was the center so broken? Indeed, unlike other Pokémon Centers across the region, this one was almost considered downright abandoned if not for the obvious activity going inside. The sidewalk and street around and leading up to the building was torn up and jutting into the air, with mysterious footprints looking vaguely like a human's strewn about.

The building itself was also in a state of disrepair. Several cracks ran down it's lopsided edges, giving it the appearanxe that someone had been leaning on it. But that's absurd! No one, not even a Pokémon, could be that big! And the roof of the center was just...actually, it didn't even have a roof! Trainer's looked up into the lobby of the public building only to find they can see the sky from inside.

What happened to this place?

Nuse Joy happened.

We see our colossal not really effective healer countuning to waddle along the streets of the city, finnaly tiring out those rambuctous Pokemon trainer's from before. She slowly trekked her way towards her Pokémon Center, following it's distinctive scent. She knew the small of the Pokémon center by heart, with all it's food and Pokémon and People conversing together.

It Nader mouth water to think of all that food in one place, just waiting to be chowed down on like a takeout box in the form of a Pokémon Center. But no, she would have to control herself. She over food, yes. But she remembered before the experiments that she used to love helping others. Naturally, she couldn't remember why that was. In her opinion, it was much more easier to eat people then it was to help them.

But, in an attempt to honor who she was before, she kept her job as a Nuse, and countuinued walking towards the Pokémon center.

Finnaly, she came to it. The reality sky tiny building only came up to her massive belly button she was so huge. She expertly navigated herself around the building without causing any more damage to the structure then she already had. She sat her monumental rear end down on the soft ground, smothering out any grass or foilage that was there before.

Even as she was sitting down, her form still rose above the Pokémon center, now reaching the height of her mighty bosom, she leaned into the open roof of the building, her mammaries making a more impressive balcony then a real one.

"Hello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center!" She greeted the inhabitants of the semi-demolished building cheerily. "Would you like me to heal your Pokemon?"

The regulars of the building were unfazed by the massive nurse Ioy that just decided to grace them with her presence. But the others were absolutist terrified. Pokemon went back inside their Pokeballs at the sight of her, the new ones fearing that they were in danger of being eaten, and the old ones knowing FULL WELL they were in danger of being eaten.

Finnaly, one brace soul stepped into the shadow that Nuse Joy's tits provided and cleared his throat.

"Excuse me, Ma'am?" A young boy in a blue jacket, dark brown khakis, and baseball cap asked. He was waiving his left arm around to get her attention, mainly because she couldn't see him with all that cleavage in the way. Joy parted her jiggling breasts to reveal the boy's diminutive form.

"Oh, hello there! Would you like me to heal your Pokemon?"

"Heh...yeah, I guess..." the boy said as he rubbed the back of his head nervously. He wasn't particularly used to speaking with a giant, fat women like the denizens of this city.

"Wonderful! Just set your Pokeballs on the desk right there, and I'll heal them up in no time at all." She said with a joyful smile. The young boy pondered on how such a huge women was capable of healing Pokémon, but he did not dwell on it. He figured a chance or Audino would come up and do all of the wok fit her. He took out his six Pokeballs contains his loved and prescious Pokemon and set them down on the desk where Nurse Joy usually would have sat behind.

Sure enough, a Chansey came up from behind the desk and took them to a typical Pokeball machine. The Pokémon set them down on the tray and the sprites of the Pokémon came up on the screen: Snorlax, Delphox, Machamp, Miltank, Wigglytuff, and a Wailord.
1251.title: She comes to the Center where she sees a traine...

choices: Nurse Joy's Gut rumbles loudly
Nathan wants to talk with Nurse Joy more
12511.content:
“You don’t know how… honored I am to meet you.” the boy said.

“Honored?” Nurse Joy said inquisitively.

“Yeah. This is a big deal for me. I didn’t think you’d--I mean I--I...sorta came all this way to just see you in person, your kinda famous." The trainer blushed awkwardly.

Nurse Joy smiled.

“I’ve been receiving those comments from dozens of handsome young boys like you. I felt pretty sure though that there all some skeevy guy's expecting me to whip my pants off." Nurse Joy giggled, her whole body jiggling "If I could fit into any pants!"

“Oh no!” The trainer was shocked, “I- I’m not-"

“But you came all this way just to see me.”

“Right. It’s… it’s kind of weird, but you’re my idol. In a way"

Nurse Joy didn’t say anything, waiting for the young trainer to continue when he was ready.

“My mom was always strict about me and Pokemon. She was a total basket case of Pokephobia, and she wanted-“

“Why don’t we save this part after I get your Pokemon healed up?" Nurse Joy said sweetly.

Te Pokeball machine made it's signature jingle, but the chancesy was a bit preoccupied with another patient. Rolling her eyes, Nurse Joy preceded to hand over the Pokemon to the trainer herself. Two fat, wobbling arms pushed themselves into the ever crampening Pokecenter towards the Pokeball Machine. Her massive breasts, full exposed for everyone to see, crashed heavily down onto the apparatus itself, nearly crushing the Poor Pokemon inside the Pokeballs. Nurse Joy honestly couldn't understand why she couldn't be in the Pokecenter anymore, or why she wasent allowed to physically touch anything Pokemon related, she was doing the latter right now and everything was going fine!

The back wall of the Pokemon center, having been put under too much stress, finally caved in under Nurse Joy's heaving bosom. The two over bloated spheres of flesh flattened the healing machine just nanoseconds after her pudgy finger grabbed the tray with the Pokeballs inside it. The Chancey, who had just finished sedating a rambunctious Aipom, was pinned into the bottom of the counter as Nurse Joy's boobabe spilled dangerously into the Pokemon Center.

“Do you want me to help you with that?” The trainer nervously asked, worried for the well being of his Pokemon.

“No, you’re fine as you are.” Nurse Joy set the Pokeballs on the heavily straining counter fot the trainer to pick up. “Just make sure you’re looking at my face and not my boobs, although It Is appreciated." Nurse Joy chucked.

“OK. … What do I talk about?” The trainer asked, handling his Pokeballs back into his pocket.

“Just go with what you were talking about before, about your mother being a a Pokephobic. Focus on why you wanted to come here, not as much about you. This isn’t a dating personal.” Nurse Joy calmly explained as if she had to give the same prep talk dozens of times before. "Even if you are my type." She added barley louder then a whisper.

“So, what your name?” Nurse Joy asked.

“My name?”

“Yeah, lots of people like to have this thing called a name." Nurse Joy giggled
.
“Nathan,” The trainer said. "And I'm a Pokemon trainer to become the very best!"

Nurse Joy smiled knowingly. She loved Nathan’s enthusiasm even if she questioned his commitment. She’d seen other trainers come in like a ball of fire, eager to get to the next Gym, only for their zeal to die down as they had to deal with the realities of a Pokemon Trainer: more expensive Items to buy, looks of disgust or concern from Pokemon, doctors haranguing them to get their Pokemon on a expertise routine.

"I just turned 18, moved away from home and now that I’ve got my freedom I am going to be the best, most powerful trainer in the world. Growing up my parents would never let me have my first Pokemon when I turned Ten, and only very rarely could I have a little pal around with the local Pokemon. My dad was in the military until he retired, but my mother was the real problem. She’s been afraid of Pokemon her entire life, always counting how many she see each day so she dosen't run into them. She kept a close watch on everything my sister and I did outside, and whenever she thought we were getting too close with them she made us join her on her morning jogs or weekend trips to the gym. She also “pressured” us to stay in school."

“So I’ve been unusually out of touch with Pokemon my entire life, even though it was never what I wanted. When I was young I didn’t care, but a few years ago I started thinking about everything I couldn’t have. The more I thought about all friends that was denied to me the more I obsessed over it. Every day I’d go out and see all those Pokemon frolicking in the tall grass, their cries echoing the air."

“It was more than I could stand, sometimes, but I never went in with them. My mother’s words were always ringing in my head: ‘You’ll get sick,’ ‘You’ll be attacked,’ ‘Show some self-control.’ But it was like pushing a basketball underwater, the harder you push the more it fights back."

Nurse Joy, unusually intrigued with Nathan's story, interjected suddenly. "I think I kinda relate to what you were going through. You see even before I got all..." She lifted up her huge belly with her fat hands and let it drop down onto the tiled floor of the Pokemon Center, further crushing the Poor Chaney underneath all that flab

"...Fat, I was still pretty fat. Before that freak genetic experimentation I was actually not your typical svelte Nurse Joy. I was addicted to food, and the fast food was the worst. Every day I’d go out and see all those franchises, giant pictures of burgers and fried chicken in their windows, the smells coming out of each place."

“I started going online, finding websites devoted to people stuffing themselves. It felt so wrong to me, but so right. It was like a monk being tempted with pornography, wanting to look but hating himself for it. But the more I explored this the more I wanted it myself. It was like watching my own dreams made real. Not just the food, but the idea of being fat. Being so large and soft…

“I still didn’t try stuffing myself, my mother’s influence was too strong while I still lived with her. But for the rest of high school I couldn’t think of anything else. It’s like with anything you can’t have, you just want it more.

“But I’m an adult now, free to eat anything and get as fat as I want. And I’m going to eat everything. And thanks to that experiment I really can!" She empahsized this by picking up a piece of debris from the ruined wall she destroyed and tossed it in her mouth like a grape.

"I’m going to go to every fast food place and try everything they have. I don’t care how fat I get, I’ll want to be even fatter. I love feeling my belly filling my lap, I love feeling my upper arms jiggling back and forth when I wave my arms, I love my butt swallowing up every BUILDING I sit on. I want to see every inch of my body bloat up as I just get fatter… and fatter… and fatter…"

"Wow..." Nathan said stunned. "I never knew that you...liked being this fat. I always thought you just learned to live with it."

“That’s fine,” Nurse Joy said, which was true. The inciting event that brought Nathan here to Nurse Joy, ready to meet his Idol and go on a Pokemon Journey, was winning the lottery. $82 million was sitting in his bank account, more than enough for anyone else to have a comfortable life and enough for Nathan to start her new life with.

Why millions of dollars didn’t seem enough, Nathan himself wasn’t sure. All he wanted was to go on a Pokemon Journey and take on the Pokemon League, and even in his wildest dreams his new fortune should have been enough.
